channel.title: Agresive Green Dragons
channel.description: im using delta and i want green dragons to be in the higher training area. but there all agressive so as soon as u tele there u get piled. now i know i have to change it in NPChandler but when i ctrl+f the green dragon id number, i get alot of results and i dont kno wich to change. also, the npc's folow me after im done attacking. for example, i fight kbd but run out of food, and tele to the home area, but like a minute later the kbd folowed em all the way to the home area. how do i make it so when i tele, he stops attacking or goes back to his respawn cords?

item.title: Agresive Green Dragons
